thread.title: Thomas Rhett & His Wife Are Expecting Two Babies… But They Aren't Twins!
thread.title_full: Thomas Rhett & His Wife Are Expecting Two Babies… But They Aren't Twins!

author: Perez Hilton
title: Thomas Rhett & His Wife Are Expecting Two Babies… But They Aren't Twins!
text:
But unlike Beyoncé and Jay Z , and George and Amal Clooney — the babies AREN'T twins! 
That's because the country crooner and his longtime love are not only pregnant with their first child, but they're also in the process of adopting a child from Africa! Exciting times!!! 
Related: Thomas & Lauren Are The Cutest Couple On The Red Carpet (Again) 
The Die A Happy Man singer took to Instagram with the precious news (below): 
We are so happy to announce that we are pregnant and we are in the process of adopting a child from Africa! Safe to say life is about to get crazy! 😜 A post shared by ThomasRhettAkins (@thomasrhettakins) on Feb 15, 2017 at 8:20am PST 
And his lovely bride added: 
"OH BABY! 😍 actually…BABIES! Our hearts are exploding with happiness for y'all to meet our new baby who we are bringing home from Africa soon🙏🏼🙌🏼 who is also going to have a little brother or sister because, SURPRISE! there's a sweet baby in my belly too 💛💛 #adopting&pregnant #cominginhot2017" 
2017 is about to get really, really real for this adorable family! Congrats!
